author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- fix static analyzer and compiler warnings
- made all methods const
- avoid using member data for temporary storage
- comply with CMS naming conventions
- use modern C++ constructs

Changes are purely technical and should have no change on the results (probably will be faster and use less memory however).

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: Modernize RecoEgamma/PhotonIdentification helpers
